name: Luminosity Drone
description: A drone project developed using Gazebo, Ubuntu, VSCode, OpenCV, and Python, focusing on drone control and image processing algorithms.

name: Technoloop Jobs
description: A React-based job portal where recruiters can post jobs and job seekers can apply. The application also tracks the status of applications.

name: Mysterious Message
description: An anonymous feedback platform built using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, with AI-based message analysis.

name: Backend Project
description: A backend project focusing on building REST APIs using Node.js and Express, with database integration (PostgreSQL) and authentication.
